keyMoments.title: Pirates Docking 3 Formation
keyMoments.description: Franky, Usopp, and Chopper form the anime-exclusive Pirates Docking 3 combination attack against Oars, with Sanji's assistance.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's continued attempts at creative combination attacks, though with limited effectiveness.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Battle Against Oars
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats employ strategic thinking to exploit Oars' Luffy-like weaknesses, using meat as bait and coordinating attacks on vulnerable points.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's growth in teamwork and tactical intelligence.

keyMoments.title: Kuma Inquires About the Crew
keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma questions Nami about the Straw Hat crew and specifically about Luffy's brother, revealing that the World Government has knowledge of and interest in Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Indicates that the Straw Hats are on the World Government's radar at the highest levels.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: Perona Removed from the Crew
keyMoments.description: Perona is defeated and sent away by Bartholomew Kuma, effectively removing her from Thriller Bark and the crew's fighting force.
keyMoments.significance: Weakens the Thriller Bark Pirates' leadership structure.
